page.title: 18Doing the Domesday Project
page.content: Doing the{Domesday Project}in the Summer Term of 1985 has brought a lot of pleasure to many School children in this area of{West Somerset. }All six of the local 5 to 9{First Schools}have been closely involved as too have several sections of the larger {Danesfield Middle School. }Many parents and residents of the area have also contributed. The Project has given the{teachers}at the various Schools the opportunity to practice the close{cooperation and liaison}that has been discused for a long time. Apart from completing the disks for the BBC children mounted a major {exhibition}of their work. This was staged at Danesfield School, lasted for a week, and drew a large and appreciative audience. Thus inspired teachers are already preparing a sequel for next summer.
